revised_title: Henry Nicholas Ridley: A Pioneering Botanist and Plant Physiologist
tldr: Henry Nicholas Ridley was a prominent botanist and plant physiologist who made significant contributions to the understanding of plant life and distribution. He served as the Director of the Gardens and Forests of the Straits Settlements at Singapore, where he developed the botanical collection and promoted the cultivation of economic plants. Ridley's work in plant distribution and his interest in the study of animal life made him a well-rounded naturalist of his time.
